title: Pinging Shyvana's Ult is Not Ready
body: I've made this topic before, two patches ago, but it hasn't been changed. Please allow me to Shyvana's ult is not ready!

replies.body: Make sure you're reporting that as a bug through the client or posting it to the [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board, otherwise the Devs won't be able to catch it!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Oz5zO4NX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-01T03:32:38.864+0000)
>
> Make sure you're reporting that as a bug through the client or posting it to the [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board, otherwise the Devs won't be able to catch it!

I did two patches ago, but it isn't a bug... A bug is something out of the ordinary, this is intentional by the developers. I would like for the game to allow me to ping when her ultimate is not ready.
